title: Enhancement Checkout Q1
description:
Description
All submitted order items are displayed on the confirmation page (“Vielen Dank für Ihre Bestellung”).
In the MVP, we will utilize the capabilities of MB2B POM and OMS/OE. Order documents are generated by NG Mobile and included with the MB2B POM orders. There is one order document for each OMS/OE order we create. The display in the order management in BSP Classic shows the generated OMS/OE orders. A stronger aggregation to one order document/pdf per shopping cart will not be implemented in Q2/2025 for velocity reasons and will be reconsidered for Q3/2025 or will be incorporated into the Comet Crew's order tracking.
